titles.title: Act to Convert Non-Physician Directors to the Senior Executive Service
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to convert non-physician directors appointed under section 4103(a)(8) of title 38, United States Code, to Senior Executive Service career appointees.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

bill.summary: 6/28/1988--Introduced. Act to Convert Non-Physician Directors to the Senior Executive Service - Provides that certain non-physician directors of the Veterans Administration's Department of Medicine and Surgery shall be career appointees in the Senior Executive Service.
